title: Add introductory reminder copy about unseen events and user choices

requirements.text: Add the following exact introductory/reminder copy to the experience UI so users see it before or at the start of the journey: "You are going on trip in RV. You dont see everything that's happening. Remember your choices!". Implement this in the Start Journey screen (frontend/src/components/rv/StartJourneyScreen.tsx) as additional visible text near the existing introduction content, without changing the sentence text, punctuation, or spelling.

quotes: Add this part like "You are going on trip in RV. You dont see everything that's happening. Remember your choices!"

acceptanceCriteria: The Start Journey screen displays the exact text: "You are going on trip in RV. You dont see everything that's happening. Remember your choices!"
The text matches exactly (including "dont" without an apostrophe), with no additional words inserted inside the quoted sentence
All user-facing text related to this addition is in English

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Backend (Motoko) is not required for this change; keep backend untouched unless strictly necessary.
nonGoals: Do not change journey flow logic, break stop logic, selection rules, or timers as part of this request.
Do not add new authentication, persistence, or backend APIs.
